Need to have a proper markdown extractor for offline use

9/6/2017
enhancement help wanted

Right now the offline markdown files inside the content directory should follow this format:

Title: This is a new title
Rest of the post goes here, more text
## written in markdown
- 1
- 2

the getOfflineFileContents method reads files inside content, converts the markdown contents to post object 

post obj {"body":"i am body","title":"i am the title"}

then we can use the the github-blog-api's createPost method to create new issue (post). Right now, it's just plain old of slice and splits to get the title and body, need a more proper and more predictable way to do this. Label support is also something that we can add to the post object.

See the code related to this issue here
